prompts.name: Technology Strategy Overview
prompts.description: The template can aid the CTO in outlining a future technology strategy. The variables involved are {{strategic goals}} referring to the primary technology goals of the company, {{key technologies}} representing major tech platforms crucial to the company, and {{implementation plan}} that lays out the timeline for technology adoption.
prompts.content: Compose a comprehensive technology strategy overview for {{CTO's name}}. The document should cover specific {{strategic goals}} that are to be achieved, provide detailed insights into the {{key technologies}}, and include a clear {{implementation plan}}.

prompts.name: System Upgrade Proposal
prompts.description: This template supports creating a proposal for system upgrades. {{Current system weaknesses}} refer to prevalent limitations, {{proposed solutions}} are the updates planned, and {{expected improvements}} are the benefits that will be observed after the upgrade.
prompts.content: Draft a proposal for {{CTO's name}} addressing {{current system weaknesses}} with the provision of effective {{proposed solutions}}. Detail the {{expected improvements}} alongside potential return on investment from such an upgrade.

prompts.name: Project Management Plan
prompts.description: This template aids in devising a project management plan. The {{project objectives}} refer to the desired outcomes, {{major deliverables}} are the substantial outputs, and {{timeline}} is the schedule for the project.
prompts.content: Develop a project management plan for {{CTO's name}} encapsulating clear {{project objectives}}. Highlight the {{major deliverables}} expected and propose a realistic {{timeline}}.

prompts.name: Cybersecurity Strategy
prompts.description: This template assists in formulating a comprehensive cybersecurity strategy. {{Identified threats}} stand for perceived cybersecurity threats, {{defense measures}} are the countermeasures recommended, and {{employee training}} refers to the training needs for preventative measures.
prompts.content: Forge a well-defined cybersecurity strategy for {{CTO's name}} outlining key {{identified threats}}. Investigate recommended {{defense measures}} while emphasising the significance of {{employee training}} in maintaining strong cyber hygiene.

prompts.name: Tech Team Performance Evaluation
prompts.description: This template guides in conducting an effective tech team performance evaluation. {{Staff member}} refers to the individual being evaluated, {{performance metrics}} are the standards for assessment, and {{recommendations}} are suggestions for improvement.
prompts.content: Create a performance evaluation report for {{CTO's name}} on {{staff member}} based on set {{performance metrics}}. Include constructive {{recommendations}} aimed at future performance improvement.

prompts.name: Software Vendor Selection Criteria
prompts.description: This template aids in outlining criteria for software vendor selection. {{Software type}} refers to the specific application type, {{vendor qualifications}} are the requirements for vendors, and {{assessment process}} represents the vendor vetting procedure.
prompts.content: Arrange suitable vendor selection criteria for {{CTO's name}} for procurement of {{software type}}. Lay emphasis on essential {{vendor qualifications}} and chalk out a transparent {{assessment process}}.

prompts.name: R&D Budget Plan
prompts.description: This template facilitates the creation of an R&D budget plan. {{Projected expenses}} cover expected costs, {{allocations}} are the budget distributions, and {{future projections}} forecast financial needs.
prompts.content: This template facilitates the creation of an R&D budget plan. {{Projected expenses}} cover expected costs, {{allocations}} are the budget distributions, and {{future projections}} forecast financial needs.

prompts.name: Technology Partnership Proposal
prompts.description: This template helps outline a proposal for a technology partnership. {{Potential partner}} is the prospective collaborator, {{shared goals}} refer to mutual objectives, and {{agreement terms}} are the partnership terms.
prompts.content: Draft a technology partnership proposal for {{CTO's name}} exploring collaboration with {{potential partner}}. Highlight {{shared goals}} and provide a draft of the {{agreement terms}}.

prompts.name: New Tech Implementation Communication
prompts.description: This template guides in drafting a communication about new tech implementation. {{Technology to be implemented}} is the new technology, {{benefits}} are the expected advantages, and {{transition plan}} is the timeline and process for implementation.
prompts.content: Write a communication on behalf of {{CTO's name}} about {{technology to be implemented}}. Dive into the {{benefits}} of this new tech and explain the {{transition plan}} to reassure staff.

prompts.name: Regulatory Compliance Update
prompts.description: This template aids in sketching an update about regulatory compliance. {{Regulations}} are the specific rules to which compliance is required, {{compliance status}} refers to the company's current adherence levels, and {{action plan}} represents the next steps for ensuring or maintaining compliance.
prompts.content: Draft a communication for {{CTO's name}} detailing our adherence to {{regulations}}. Present a clear statement of our {{compliance status}} and outline the {{action plan}} moving forward to address any shortcomings. Make sure to clearly state any potential impact on operations.
